1.0.name: wordpress/woocommerce-users-custom-meta-search
1.0.description:
WooCommerce Users Custom Meta Search is a small plugin that adds WooCommerce users meta fields to the WordPress default users search. In other words this plugins gives the ability to search users by "Billing firstname", "Shipping Country", "Billing email", or any other fields created by WooCommerce during the order process.

Developer Website

Features

  • Adds choosen WooCommerce users meta fields to WordPress default users search
  • Adds settings to WooCommerce > Settings > General
